item.title: The Poor Availability of Psychological Research Data for Reanalysis
item.description: Reference Jelte M. Wicherts, Denny Borsboom, Judith Kats, Dylan Molenaar “The poor availability of psychological research data for reanalysis” (2006) // American Psychologist.
